sub_title: Entrepreneur and strategist with an MBA, experienced in business development of early-stage companies within the financial, retail, and service industries.
summary:
I am an entrepreneur and strategist with an MBA, experienced in business development of early-stage companies within the financial, retail, and service industries. Known as a people leader with special focus on coaching and development, I offer a proven ability at designing and implementing systems that optimize productivity and reduce costs while increasing revenue and customer satisfaction.

With strong business ethics and innovative thinking, I have consistent results in:
•	Strategic Planning – Crafted successful business models and businesses plans, implemented them, and drove their success.

•	Business Development – Strengthened business performance through business intelligence and P&L analysis, fully owning and driving projects for the long term.

•	People Management – Built consistently strong, diverse and qualified teams, successfully increasing team engagement and leading in achieving company objectives. All in all, an outstanding leadership of teams, resources and opportunities.

•	Stakeholder Management: Excel at identifying the needs of key players, earning their    trust, monitoring their satisfaction and identifying new opportunities. 

I am a husband and a father that stands for what is right and works to live according to what really matters, leading by example in order to leave a legacy that can make a difference in people’s lives. This is who I am.

I am convinced that in order to get things done, you need not just skills but personality, character, and a hands-on attitude that will build a strong team that you can coach, mentor, and lead to deliver results in any international environment.

profile_positions.description:
I coach entrepreneurs in starting up and offer consulting services for designing business models and plans. 

•	Guided a retired Olympic Athlete and twice New York Marathon 1st place winner, into refining the type of services he could provide, designing a business model and plan for a Running Coach Franchise to launch in USA, Mexico and The Netherlands. The model is a Startup Ecosystem designed to fully optimize his Know How & Brand in the long run.
•	Guided an entrepreneur in finding opportunities around him and creating a business model and plan to import/export products between America and Europe. Also developed the operational structure for the startup that is expected to operate in Mexico and The Netherlands. Among other things, some aspects of this consulting job included: 
       o	Talks and meetings with the Commercial Trade Director of the Mexican Embassy for Benelux
       o	Meeting with several trading companies in the Rotterdam port
       o	Meeting with consultants and logistics specialists of perishable products
       o	Meeting with possible capital investors
       o	Have started sketching the first ideas of my leadership coaching program, along with my first book.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Consulting Services - Europe

company.name: Franchesia Franquicias Maestras - Doc Popcorn’s Master Franchise (largest retail brand in USA)

profile_positions.company: Franchesia Franquicias Maestras - Doc Popcorn’s Master Franchise (largest retail brand in USA)
profile_positions.description:
Rapidly and successfully grew a National Master Franchise. Managed 13 venues across 7 states; reported to Board of Directors; 3 direct reports.

•	Co-designed the business model for Mexico, and negotiated the Master Franchise contract.
•	Led the design, execution and follow-up of the brand launch, as well as all marketing campaigns and activations for all locations and venues in collaboration with external agencies, including pricing strategies and introduction of innovations and complimentary products.
•	Personally, tropicalized and designed operational and management manuals for franchisees, including formats for control. Designed and launched a Help Desk Center to efficiently respond to Franchisee needs and enhance trust. 
•	Surpassed new-franchise openings target by 25%, selling 13 franchises in 3 years by innovating in the way we approached sales prospects, by standing out in the most important franchise fairs and events, and by designing and implementing a strict follow-up process of prospects.  
•	Increased profit margin by 35% for franchisees’ venues by re-thinking the supply chain and procuring consumables locally, eliminating currency exchange risks, optimizing processes, closely training owners and managers, and by constantly communicating best practices that help achieve more with less while keeping a very strict quality control. 
•	After the described success, designed a new, 5-year business strategy to fast-track growth, transforming our Franchise Business Model into a Financial Business Model, creating a platform to receive private Capital without losing the control of the Company and focusing on high quality standards and innovative and efficient operations.
profile_positions.title: General Manager

profile_positions.description:
Headed the financial business. Reported to Managing Director and Board of Directors; 8 direct reports.

•	Invited as member of Corporate Board: advised and led Grupo CLISA on creating its Corporate Governance that encompassed 23 companies in 5 divisions (Energy, Logistics, Trade & Services, Real Estate, Construction).
•	Turned company around: owner, designer and driver of the plan that increased operational efficiencies, expanded customer portfolio, reverted losses, reached breakeven point, and generated the company’s first profits.
•	Increased credit placement by 30%, improved capitalization & reception of external funds; introduced new products.
•	Reduced non-performing loan portfolio by 90% and doubled the loans portfolio.
•	Restructured all administration, financial, and accounting processes, obtaining its first ISO 9000 Certification.
profile_positions.title: General Manager - Member of the Corporate Board - SOFIR

company.name: Ingeniat - Tech Company that develops e-learning platforms and solutions for schools

profile_positions.company: Ingeniat - Tech Company that develops e-learning platforms and solutions for schools
profile_positions.description:
Introduced systems and processes to ensure both customer retention and satisfaction, as well as to offer other solutions and services. Also, I was invited to help developing the future of the company; 2 direct reports. 

•	Doubled number of end users in 1 year & activated new services for existing clients
•	Designed and implemented its first customer service strategy, achieving high customer satisfaction.
•	Created and standardized processes that successfully engaged and developed our employees and collaborators.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service & Key Accounts Manager + Strategy Planner member

company.name: Servicios Integrales San Pedro - Group that spearheaded innovative funeral services in Mexico

profile_positions.company: Servicios Integrales San Pedro - Group that spearheaded innovative funeral services in Mexico
profile_positions.description:
Project manager of the company’s start-up process including: project development of all departments, infrastructure, launch and marketing strategy. Reported to Managing Director; 1 direct report.

•	Managed pre-operating stage of business including implementing business plan, advertising and media campaigns, prepared monthly reports for Board of Directors, and remained on schedule within start-up budget plan.
•	Renovated commercial strategy and sales manuals to support Sales team.
•	Advised in development of new commercial strategies to help increase sales.
•	Led creation of HR department: created operation manuals, recruited and hired Operation & Sales team.
profile_positions.title: Head Of Operations
